entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low plus 2 with temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the evening. Rain mixed with wet snow late in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Low plus 2 with temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
